name: Exam Project KIT109
description:
Z - Left flipper
/ - Right flipper
Space - Launch ball/boost/launcher
Right click for debug movement

1-0 changes level from 1-10, esc for title

Welcome to pinball! Use the flippers to launch the ball and get as many points as possible!

The movement aspect for debug movement – Quarag, https://forum.unity.com/threads/unity-4-3-get-2d-mouse-coordinates-relative-to-the-scene.214091/

Scanlines - https://forums.libretro.com/t/some-scanline-overlays-w-fade-effect/1845

Button operated scene switcher – KIT109 Tutorials

End game listener – KIT 109 Tutorials

TripWire and RaycastUtils – KIT 109 Tutorials

Attempted features: Everything in the spec except for sounds, and the 2 custom levels.
